channel.title: Metabolomics on CityU-Bioinformatics
channel.description: Recent content in Metabolomics on CityU-Bioinformatics

item.description: Table of Contents Metabolic profiles analysis Metabolic Network analysis mGWAS Metabolite enrichment analysis MS-based untargeted Metabolomics Metabolic Network analysis mGWAS Metabolite enrichment analysis NMR-based Metabolomics/MS-based targeted metabolomics Spectral corrections Spectral deconvolution Chemometric analysis Metabolite identification Metabolic profiles analysis The further development of spectroscopic and spectrometric tools for high throughput analyses of selected biochemical pathways is crucial to the acquisition of metabolome data sets of sufficient quality for metabonomics and metabolomics.

item.title: RNA Transcription
item.description: Table of Contents Transcription analysis Lipidomics Databases MS-based untargeted lipidomics MS-based targeted lipidomics Transcription analysis Transcript abundance is in many ways an extraordinary phenotype, with special attributes that confer particular importance on an understanding of its genetics. The primary transformative potential of genome-wide gene expression genetics is the sheer number of traits — thousands — that can be assayed simultaneously. Lipidomics Databases Development of databases and the related bioinformatics tools has become an essential part of the omics studies.
